question: What is Mr Bigglesworth?
answer: Mr Bigglesworth is a World of Warcraft database app. It lets you search for items, quests, achievements, quests, and more. And it lets you view Wowhead comments for them. All without having to switch between the game and a browser

question: Why did you build this app?
answer:
I hate switching between WoW and my browser every time I need to check a comment to help me find what I'm looking for.

Also, I have a permit https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q0d-O2go9Po

question: I don't even see Mr Bigglesworth anywere!
answer:
Between server costs and app publishing fees, I'm too poor to hire a designer to draw Mr Bigglesworth for the app.

If you'd like to help, get in touch on our Discord https://discord.gg/9yWny58

question: Err, those comments look weird. Why does it show Wowhead IDs instead of item, etc, name?
answer: I'll fix this at some point in the future

question: Your app sucks / is great! How do I give feedback?
answer:
I've setup a Discord.

Join here https://discord.gg/9yWny58

question: I heard open source?
answer:
